title: Knife, Fork, 18th century
provenance: formerly in the Wallace Nutting Collection
description:
knife (a): Slightly curving blade, tapering tubular blue and white porcelain handle decorated with stylized blue flowers and sprigs on a white ground.
fork (b): Three tine steel fork, tapering tubular porcelain handle painted with stylized blue flowers and sprigs on a white ground.

tombstone.epitaph: Knife, Fork, 18th century. porcelain, nickel, steel. 1931-5-26-a,b.
